articles.title: Agong to select new PM to form next federal govt if Muhyiddin steps down tomorrow – political analyst - The Borneo Post
articles.description:
KUCHING (Aug 15): Political analyst Prof James Chin believed that the Yang di-Pertuan Agong will select a new prime minister to form the next federal government if Prime Minister Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin steps down tomorrow.

articles.title: 'Untrue': MOH responds after Facebook post suggesting 3-year-old girl died of Covid-19 at KKH went viral - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A Facebook post circulating online suggesting that a three-year-old pre-schooler had died of Covid-19 at the KK Women's and Children's Hospital (KKH) is untrue. The Ministry of Health (MOH) said this on Saturday (Aug 14) in its Facebook post. The …

articles.title: 34-year-old Singaporean doctor dies after 8-year battle with epilepsy - AsiaOne
articles.description: After having to live with a serious epileptic condition for the past eight years, a young Singaporean doctor succumbed to the rare neurological disorder on National Day (Aug 9), leaving her grieving husband and family to cope with the loss. Prior to her death…
